english.segment1: Oh my Lord. You are so kind. Oh my Lord. You are so kind
english.segment2: Morning to morning. Day to day. You reveal your righteous ways
english.segment3: (Chorus). It's your kindness that leads to repentance. It's your blood that brings forgiveness. It's your mercy that leads me here. To your throne of grace. Your throne of grace
english.segment4: Oh my Lord. You are so kind. Oh my Lord. You are so kind
english.segment5: Morning to morning. Day to day. You reveal your righteous ways. I'ts your kindness
english.segment7: In your kindness I find repentance. In your blood I find forgiveness. In your mercy I find myself at your throne of grace. Your throne of grace
